etc.name: Experimentalists Anonymous
etc.description: is an online resource and community for people interested in do-it-yourself audio electronics which I have maintained since 2003.

etc.name: eaced
etc.description: was my web-based business, through which I sold custom-built audio hardware from 2004-2009.

etc.name: The Columbia Neural Network Reading Group and Seminar Series
etc.description: was a bi-weekly group I started which hosted talks and paper discussions about neural networks and their applications.

etc.name: Hacking Audio and Music Research (HAMR)
etc.description: is a series of research hackathons I have coordinated since 2013.

etc.name: Synth-in-a-Month
etc.description: is an analog modular synthesizer I built in January of 2006.

etc.name: I built a hollowbody electric guitar
etc.description: at the Totnes School of Guitarmaking during my final semester of high school.

etc.name: The ooscc
etc.description: is an open-ended hardware controller I designed which communicates over Ethernet using Open Sound Control.
